segments.text: Okay , Doctor , tell it to me straight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you want to live much longer you have to give up smoking .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've tried before . Everything I've tried doesn't work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe with the choice of life or death before you , you will find it easier .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I see that x-ray again ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: See all these black areas ? That's tar built up in your Lungs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And that is what's causing my shortness of breath .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look at it this way , when you quit , you will save money , time and your life !
segments.speaker: S2
